name: Undercity Necrolisk
originalText: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Undercity Necrolisk. It gains menace until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

rulings.text: Multiple instances of menace on the same creature are redundant.

text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Undercity Necrolisk. It gains menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
